articles.description: Finnebrogue is a major supermarket supplier employing around 1,000 people
articles.content:
Co Down businessman Denis Lynn has tragically died in a quad bike accident.
The Finnebrogue founder, who started out selling pizzas and pies out of a little white van and farming before moving onto … [+2826 chars]
